Scripts.OnLoad: GwStaggerBar.value = 0 GwStaggerBar.spark = self.spark GwStaggerBar.texture1 = self.texture1 GwStaggerBar.texture2 = self.texture2 GwStaggerBar.fill = self.fill GwStaggerBar.fill:SetVertexColor(59/255,173/255,231/255)

Scripts.OnClick: if not self.container:IsShown() then self.container:Show() else self.container:Hide() end
